model_input:

Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Unknown, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:

Classmates A may struggle with focusing and staying motivated at times, but they are open to seeking help and making positive changes in their life.

Event Description: Classmates A and Classmates B have fun singing karaoke and look forward to going out together. They have also made plans to hang out at home and catch up on reading. Classmates A has treated Classmates B to coffee and enjoys treating their friends. Classmates A has also suggested planning a picnic or hike for them to enjoy together.
